about_the_game:
Repossession is a 2D Action-Packed Shooter, Heisting Game, with Deathmatch and Multiplayer Coop to Come - Either fighting their way through missions, robbing bank after bank or with each other. (soon) - they descend through Chaos for Big Earnings and pay off the remaining debt.

Single Weapon for Now


In case of a fight breaks out, and when your Primary is out of Ammo, Switching to your secondary is faster than reloading.

Tight Gunplay


Backstory:
Washington 1990s, The Player used to own a quiet bakery in town, the bakery was nice and all but it was heavily in debt, The local gang came and threatened the Player if he couldn't pay it back in time. The Player much to his dismay was running out of time, then with no choice was forced to take on Crime in order to pay the money back.

Main Story:
The Player started out with petty theft, holding a few places up. The Player soon finds out it's not enough to pay it back, he would need to do bigger and bigger jobs. This is where the player starts, Will you the player get out of debt in time, or pay the price.

Features
    [One Gamemode - Heist]
    [Two Maps - Tutorial Forest, Gas Station]
    [M16]
    [Working Health System, and Current Ammo And Max Ammo]
    [Experience a Outdoor Section and a Indoor Sections, for close compact gunplay, or for Long Distance Shooting.]
    [Fully Supported Quit Button on the Main Menu..]
    [Many More to Come.]

Planned Features
    [More than one Gamemode - Deathmatch, General Mutiplayer]
    [More Weapons - Snipers, Pistols, Melees, etc]

content_descriptors.notes: Depiction of Weapons and Drugs (At some point in the future).

detailed_description:
DISCORD CHANNEL

Join the Repossession Discord server to keep up with updates, and to give feedback!


About the Game

Repossession is a 2D Action-Packed Shooter, Heisting Game, with Deathmatch and Multiplayer Coop to Come - Either fighting their way through missions, robbing bank after bank or with each other. (soon) - they descend through Chaos for Big Earnings and pay off the remaining debt.

Single Weapon for Now


In case of a fight breaks out, and when your Primary is out of Ammo, Switching to your secondary is faster than reloading.

Tight Gunplay


Backstory:
Washington 1990s, The Player used to own a quiet bakery in town, the bakery was nice and all but it was heavily in debt, The local gang came and threatened the Player if he couldn't pay it back in time. The Player much to his dismay was running out of time, then with no choice was forced to take on Crime in order to pay the money back.

Main Story:
The Player started out with petty theft, holding a few places up. The Player soon finds out it's not enough to pay it back, he would need to do bigger and bigger jobs. This is where the player starts, Will you the player get out of debt in time, or pay the price.

Features

    [Two Maps - Tutorial Forest, Gas Station]
    [M16]
    [Working Health System, and Current Ammo And Max Ammo]
    [Experience a Outdoor Section and a Indoor Sections, for close compact gunplay, or for Long Distance Shooting.]
    [Fully Supported Quit Button on the Main Menu..]
    [Many More to Come.]

Planned Features

    [More Weapons - Snipers, Pistols, Melees, etc]
name: Repossession

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i3 / AMD FX processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
